statements: SELECT * FROM messages
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM conversations;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, message_text FROM conversations WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT conversation_id, user_id1, sent_at FROM conversations ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE user_id1 = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT conversation_id, message_text FROM conversations WHERE user_id1 = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT users.username, conversations.message_text FROM users INNER JOIN conversations ON users.user_id = conversations.user_id1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id2 FROM conversations WHERE sent_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, COUNT(*) FROM conversations GROUP BY user_id1, user_id2 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY user_id1 ASC,user_id2 DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE archived = false;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id1, user_id2, started_at FROM conversations ORDER BY started_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE sent_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sent_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id1, user_id2 FROM conversations WHERE archived = FALSE ORDER BY last_message_at DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN conversations ON users.user_id = conversations.user_id1 WHERE conversations.archived = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY user_id HAVING message_count > 100 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT user_id1, user_id2 FROM conversations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT conversation_name, created_at FROM conversations ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%'
SELECT message_text, sent_at FROM messages WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE user_id1 = '1a5d0d1a-4fa2-446f-aeb0-261d2b25990c'
SELECT conversation_name, created_at FROM conversations WHERE user_id1 = '1a5d0d1a-4fa2-446f-aeb0-261d2b25990c' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT messages.message_text, users.username FROM messages JOIN users ON messages.user_id = users.user_id WHERE messages.sent_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT attachments.attachment_url FROM attachments JOIN messages ON attachments.message_id = messages.message_id WHERE messages.conversation_id = '63848ff9-d85b-47a8-88f9-1590423d7e02'
SELECT users.username, conversations.conversation_name FROM users JOIN conversations ON users.user_id = conversations.user_id2 ORDER BY conversations.created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id1, user_id2, timestamp FROM conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, connection_type FROM user_connections WHERE connection_type = 'friend';
SELECT user_id, notification_text, is_read FROM user_notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, COUNT(*) FROM conversations GROUP BY user_id1, user_id2 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'user%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_connection FROM user_connections GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
